vv64:10.2: nādo → nādī (sya1ed, pts-vp-pli1); nādi (sya2ed, pts-vp-pli-a, mr)
vv64:20.2: hadayeritaṁ pītiṁ → hadayeritaṁ pati (bj, pts-vp-pli2); hadayeritampi taṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
vv64:22.4: hadayeritaṁ pītiṁ → hadayeritaṁ pati (bj, pts-vp-pli2); hadayeritampi taṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
vv64:23.3: Uposathaṁ kaṁ vā → uposathaṁ kiṁ va (sya1ed, sya2ed)
vv64:24.1: Nayīdamappassa katassa → nayidaṁ appassa katassa (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1-2); sāsedaṁ appakatassa (mr)
vv64:33.1: Nayimasmiṁ loke parasmiṁ → imasmiṁ loke parasmiṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed); nayimasmiṁ vā loke parasmiṁ (kv4.3:63 [Sattarasamavagga/ Navattabbaṁbuddhassadinnaṁmahapphalantikathā]); nayimasmi loke va parasmi (?)
